column1: # Title: GCAM 32-region names with climate zone

# Description: Maps GCAM region IDs to region names. Climate regions are temperate if north of the tropic of Cancer (23   27') or south of the Tropic of Capricorn (23   27'). Tropical regions are those within these two tropics. India is split between both temperate and tropical; however
column2: most production happens in southern part https://ipad.fas.usda.gov/rssiws/al/sasia_cropprod.aspx.  Same happens with Mexico so we assume tropical. For South_America Southern most countries are tropical; except for Chile and Uruguay
